name: Zambie Attack
description:
Hi everyone, This is just something i was working on for a while. Just wanted to get it out there since i lost my project files.

Thanks for trying it out, Let me know what you thought.

Controls - 

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Fire

Q - Use Ammo Boxes ( Must be in range )

E - Switches Weapon

R - Reloads Weapon

ESC - Pause
